entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 10:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
